text: me nisa ohuwa minimaruwaku, mlechcha ranakamiyaku, samula ghathakayaku saha guptha...

esenam merata panditha mahathwarun dalada wassa mithyawakayi kiyanne ee sandaha asamath widyawak pihita karaganimeni.(kalaguna widyawa wuwa yam yam sansleshi nowana siddhi niwaradiwa pahada denne wiya hakiya.namuth dalada wathura mithyawaka yi kiyannata ee bhawitha kirimata in awasara labenne natha.)dalada wassata hethu padaka wanne sansleshi sadhakayak nam ee therum ganimata sansleshi nowana paddhathiyakin nohaki bawa me niwatayanta nowatahima pilibandawa api puduma nowemu.ee owunge manasika bankolothbhawaye pramanaya weyi.kumbauraka pambaayeku wisin karanu labana karyayama mowuhu meratada karathi.kurullan baya kirima harunu kota pambaayata kala haki wena yam deyak natha.kohen ho ahulagath pandi kathawak yodagena sampradayika wishwasa ha janamathayanta paharadima harunu kota mowuntada kala haki nirmanashili karyayak natha.kurullan pambaayata biya wanne pambaayata kisiwak kala nohaki bawa nodanna nisaya.merata janathawath me mahathwarunta yam tharamaka ho bayak dakwanne nam e owunge puhu bawa pilibandawa athi nodannakama nisaya.pambaaya thula aduma tharamin piduru wath atha.mowuhu eetath wada pussoya.
pitarata pawathna hama deyakma "raththaran" yayi piliganna me niladharin mawbimata pamina yuropiya ratawaladi thaman ugath de merata kriyathmaka kirima sandaha ana panath ha chakralekha panawathi.

katana migamuwa pradeshiya shasanarakshaka mandalaye meheyawimen elambaena wesak pasaloswaka pohoya nimiththen kula daruwan siya deneku sasun gatha kirimata katayuthu yoda atha.wayasa 12 ‚Äì 20 th athara sasun gatha wimata kamathi kula daruwange mawpiya ha bharakaruwangen wagakimak sahithawa bara dena lesath ese pawidi karanu labana samanera himiwarunge idiri adhyapana katayuthu wagakimakin itu karagena yamata da katayuthu yodana bawa katana migamuwa shasanarakshaka mandalaye lekhakadhikari gaurawa shasthrawedi siduwe sumanawansha himiyo pawasathi.

wisheshayenma me wana wita mathdrawaya saha pathalaya, ehema nathnam sanwidhanathmaka aparadha, ekata bandunu kriyawaliyak lesayi siduwenne.

melesa warshika aadayama ihala yama, banku ha mulya, aahara pana ha dumkola, widuli sandesha aadi kshethrayan hi piliwelin siyayata 22, 26 ha 33 mattam wala pawathiyi. 2017 mulya wasare banku ha sangatha kihipayaka labha ihala dama ganim sambandha wartha anuwa komarshal bankuwa rupiyal biliyana 16.5 dakwa siyayata 14.25 kin da, hatan nashanal bankuwa rupiyal biliyana 16.5 dakwa siyayata 16.4 kin da, jon kils samagama rupiyal biliyana 23 dakwa siyayata 28 kin da siya aadayam ihala dama gena thibe.
